original_text: But by the grace of God I am what I am: and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain; but I laboured more abundantly than they all: yet not I, but the grace of God which was with me.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 나 된 것은 하나님의 은혜로 된 것이니 내게 주신 그의 은혜가 헛되지 아니하여 내가 모든 사도보다 더 많이 수고하였으나 내가 한 것이 아니요 오직 나와 함께 하신 하나님의 은혜로라

sentences.original_text: But by the grace of God
and his grace which was bestowed upon me
but I laboured more abundantly than they all
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그들 모두보다 더 많이 수고했다

sentences.original_text: but grace of God which was with me
